title: Pendulum
text:
Pendulum is one of my earliest game ideas. It's built around the idea that with one simple interaction it is possible to create very complex movement.
I still feel there is more to explore with this game and I will definitely revisit the game for further development.

title: Spaghetti
text:
Spaghetti is a clipboard history manager that I built because I couldn't find one i liked.
 It is very simple but effective tool that I use all the time.

title: Thrusters
text: Thrusters is a game where you control a small rocket and try not to crash. It has been said it is really hard.

title: Notelify
text:
Notelify is a note taking app that i put together because i wanted a place where I could put down notes fast and just scroll to older notes.
 It has a tagging system, but it's mostly made to be an infinite feed of notes. Initially I intended for it to have a fast search function, but I never got around to implementing that. 
 there is however no e2e enncryption so i wouldn't recommend using the app for sensitive things.
